profile:
With a minimum 2 year Warranty, we at 310-RENO know how to design and build lasting results and lasting relationships with each of our highly respected clients.
 
Our focus is on Custom Basement Renovation projects, Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions.
 
We provide custom marble and tile install services as our marble and tile setters are highly skilled and detail oriented. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.
service_area: Mississauga, Etobicoke, Oakville, Toronto, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa, Scarborough, Burlington, Milton, Woodbridge, Concord, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Aurora, Whitby, Brampton, North York, Hamilton
services: Basement Renovation, Bathroom Renovation, Basement Finishing, Bathroom Remodeling, Kitchen Makeovers, Kitchen Renovation, Engineering, structural engineering, mechanical engineering, drafting services, home additions, rear additions, home extensions, rear extensions, marble installers, tile installation, ceramic tile setting, marble tile setting  and most Interior Renovation Projects.
specialities: We Specialize in the core services we provide, such as Basement Renovation, Bathroom Renovation, Basement Finishing, Bathroom Remodeling, Kitchen Makeovers, and Kitchen Renovations, home additions, rear additions, home extensions, and rear extensions. We provide custom marble and tile install services as our marble and tile setters are highly skilled and detail oriented.

profile: Welcome to Integrity Contracting Corp. We are a quality Home Additions, framing and Custom Homes Construction company that delivers projects on time, on budget and in quality way at a fair and reasonable market price. Serving Toronto and the GTA. And now serving the Innisfil-Barrie area ABOUT US Find us on Facebook! The majority of our business comes from word of mouth and repeated business thanks to consistent customer satisfaction. We achieve this through practicing exquisite attention to detail and excellence in customer service. Our mission statement includes preserving our level of integrity, professionalism, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our customers. Our services include: *New Homes Framing *Water Proofing *Excavation *Post & Beam Timber Construction *Framing & Timber Frames *Demolition *Home Additions *Decks & Fences *Commercial Wood Roof Systems *Glue-Lam Structures *I.C.F foundation *Undepinning
service_area: Toronto, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Concord, Richmond Hill, Etobicoke
products:
We prefer to use "Mould treated lumber" for building, but will use any other construction grade material prefered by our customers.
We also use  I.C.F
